website_summaries.verdict: This single-item pack includes a cotton glove encased in a stainless steel glove for dual cut and scrap resistance.
pros: Protects your hand from scrapes and cuts
Comfortable fit with cotton glove inside stainless steel glove
Unique nylon belt design and metal button decoration
Good for butchers, rotary workers, fishermen, and cooks
Protects against cuts and slices, but not chopping action
cons: May shed wires, so inspect closely before using for food preparation

customer_reviews.title: It sheds metal, this is not safe for food ...
customer_reviews.text: It sheds metal, this is not safe for food handling, this product should be taken out of the market for food preparation
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Sardelis

customer_reviews.title: it does the job protecting your hand cutting anything from ...
customer_reviews.text: it does the job protecting your hand cutting anything from beef or pork. its hard to clean and when you use brush to clean it , it sheds some metal. i had this for a month and i have to throw them because they having rust build up. wont recommed to other..
customer_reviews.author: Jhef

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product, especially when it comes to getting a ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product, especially when it comes to getting a fish, like this toadfish, off the hook without getting your hands pierced!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Good but runs a bit large in size
customer_reviews.text: I like this product it arrived very fast and was exactly what I expected however the sizes seem to run a bit small especially if you are a petite female. I wish I had ordered a size smaller, but other than that I enjoy this product. I am a person with a physical disability, stroke survivor, so I only have control of one arm. cutting things in my kitchen can be dangerous! this glove has ensured my safety while preparing my own meals and I am able to cook on my own without assistance.
customer_reviews.author: Laura S.

customer_reviews.title: Great glove and perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Great glove and perfect fit. Easy to grip anything with the glove on. They form perfectly to the hand like a second skin. Worked well for cutting. I could also use them to deal with broken glass.Highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Jian Lan

customer_reviews.title: WORRY FREE HAND PROTECTION AND IT SECURELY GRIPS SLIMY FISH
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to wear while filleting fish and, not only does it protect my hand from cuts, it really grips the slimy fish--so it's like two tools in one. I've only used it a couple of times, but I really like how it takes the worry out of flailing around with a razor sharp fillet knife. I would have bought it years ago if I knew how well it performs.
customer_reviews.author: Dave P.

customer_reviews.title: Time saver
customer_reviews.text: This product will save you from slicing up your hands when you’re not paying close attention to your work. Just keep in mind that the edge of your knife will dull every time it touches this glove, so I process my fish as if I don’t have the glove on. I recommend you do the same otherwise It’ll take forever to process your meat with your dull knife.
customer_reviews.author: Wade

customer_reviews.title: Excellent protection from the sharp blades
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves. Went up one size from what was recommended for my wife's hand. Size chart recommended a "Small" glove for her...went for the "Medium" and it did great for her. Remember that there is a cloth glove that goes on first, then the stainless steel mesh glove. That's why we "up-sized" it to Medium. Very good protection!
customer_reviews.author: GeneGuru

customer_reviews.title: jut saying.
customer_reviews.text: Not to be that person but I was able to cut these with scissors. Then again I was testing it against some really strong scenarios.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money but probably not for a pro kitchen setting
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for a few days and I'm seeing lots of little stray wires coming out of the mesh I'm seriously giving it a shot but I'm afraid I'll send metal mesh out to a customer and that I couldn't live with probably more suited for someone cleaning deer or animals at home
customer_reviews.author: jason camin

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had noticed it was a single glove
customer_reviews.text: Needed a pair of gloves. Saw this, thought it was perfect, and for the right price. But since it ended up being only one glove, it was NOT what we needed. Never used. Purchased a second pair and used them instead. Will probably never use this glove.
customer_reviews.author: hweir

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for accident prone cook!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift, and its perfect. If you have a friend who is careless in the kitchen, this will save them lots of Band-Aids! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: MsMomof2

customer_reviews.title: good butchers glove
customer_reviews.text: very good butchers glove we needed to replace 25 year old gloves...these fit good and seem to be very good quality
customer_reviews.author: Kristi  Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: One mid-sized Glove
customer_reviews.text: One cut resistant glove only - which was not clear from the listing. Also small for my large hand.
customer_reviews.author: Adventures in Wonderworld

customer_reviews.title: Metal tends to fall/break off. Tends to rust with ...
customer_reviews.text: Metal tends to fall/break off. Tends to rust with cleaning. Only offered in medium size- will be returning additional gloves ordered
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finaly somewhat honest gloves.
customer_reviews.text: After ordering several different pairs from different manufacturers, this seems to be the only one that is made from stainless steel. Albeit thin steel it is at least definitely steel and not steel fabric.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Well Made and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Seem well made and comfortable. Some of the steel fibers seem frayed as if they had been snagged on something....time will tell how this affects the glove’s lifespan.
customer_reviews.author: jfachatz

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with the material
customer_reviews.text: I used just 1 time and it was enough to trough it out
customer_reviews.author: Jony

customer_reviews.title: seems like good quality
customer_reviews.text: glove fits well, seems like good quality, will recommend. only thing is the advertisement is not too clear. to my surprise it was only one glove instead of a pair. only after looking really well i discovered that on the very bottom it said one glove only. who uses one glove only? the norm is a pair.
customer_reviews.author: shadow a

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Just as ordered.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, great gloves for the price. We accidentally ordered 2 sets and had to return one.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Working as expected
customer_reviews.text: the product worked well for handing sharp knifes, I also used it for handing power cutting tools, so far it has met my expections.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: I like this
customer_reviews.text: Love this glove. I am no longer afraid to use my mandolin.
customer_reviews.author: Jesuslover

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Good for my needs as a meat cutter, easy to clean and dry​ quickly
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Is ok no pro but good for home or once a week business use
customer_reviews.author: Gili

customer_reviews.title: Mini gauntlet glove
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mainly for my kids but I also use it when cutting up whole pigs, cow, fish and goat.
customer_reviews.author: Christian P.

customer_reviews.title: Great for food prep.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for so I can use my knife set for parties.
customer_reviews.author: Liberty

customer_reviews.title: Best gloves ever
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying and using them for one year and it been the best does far
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cut proof love it!
customer_reviews.text: I work with a ton of knives, and the ones we have at work are not nearly as protective. So i bought this steel mesh glove! cut proof love it!
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM HARVEY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Actual Stainless steel. Flexible. Can be used ambidextrously. Safe protection from blades while handling cold meat.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Rode

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This glove is a must if you use sharp knives.
customer_reviews.author: ZEPLEN

customer_reviews.title: cut right through
customer_reviews.text: bought it to use with cutting at work, shears cut right through them. Not useful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its not what i was expecting, i though it was stainless not fabric
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Review

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, as good as the much more expensive gloves
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: Hole in the finer upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: This glove arrived with a hole in one of the fingers. I deemed that unacceptable for stab resistant gloves. 10/10 would NOT recommend. Just to clarify, my rating on this product is 0/10. Steer clear.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Scott Broadway

customer_reviews.title: Nice and fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Items very nice and very efficient, dealer is fast too
customer_reviews.author: Jiza a.

customer_reviews.title: Stronger than most other low cost cut proof gloves
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and am happy with them. I am very large hands, fit me well, strong and feel protected. Doesn't offer same protection as a 100.00 mesh glove, but I don't expect that in this price point.
customer_reviews.author: bigromo

product_meta.title: Safety Cut Proof Stab Resistant Imported 316 Stainless Steel Metal Mesh Butcher Glove Size M High Performance Level 5 Protection
product_meta.description:
Style:Level 5Feature: 
Come with stainless steel Gloves and Cotton glove 
Safety cut proof protect:100% Stainless steel wire 
* Brand new five fingers,each bid for single stainless glove and one white cotton glove 
Fit to both right and left hands 
Function:Cut-resistant,stab-resistant,Anti-knife,Anti-Scratch 
Protection grade: 5 
Size: 
Palm width about: 9.5cm 
Total length: 23CM / 9.06 (inch) 
Length of the middle finger: 8cm / 3.15 (inch) 
Note: one size only, please measure palm's width, length of the middle finger and length of hand before buying. It is very important to avoid return. 
Package Include: 
1x Cut-resistant Glove (not a pair) 

Pls double check the size information before you place the order.
feature_bullets: HIGH QUALITY 316 Stainless Steel Wire---FDA recognized
Great performance in handing sharp knifes, cutting, wood carving, carpentry; Good gifts idea for your friends
Level 5 Protection,protecting your hands from scrapes and cuts
Perfect fit with adjustable buckle and human engineering design
ATTENTION: Length of the middle finger: 3.15in, Palm width about: 3.74in, Total length:9.06in

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars160 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
